TECHWATCH- WSJ 4-col. lead, "Power Shifts Atop Google: Internet Giant Says Co-Founder Larry Page Will Replace CEO Eric Schmidt ," by Amir Efrati and Jessica Vascellaro: Eric Schmidt [ age 55], who has been chairman and CEO but shared decision-making with Mr. Larry Page and co-founder Sergey Brin [ age 37], is stepping aside in April into the new post of executive chairman.... Mr. Larry Page , 38, will take over day-to-day operations April 4. The computer scientist was Google's founding CEO before handing the reins to Mr. Eric Schmidt in August 2001. -- Eric Schmidt 's "An update from the Chairman," on The Official Google Blog: " Sergey Brin has decided to devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products.

Today Mr Justice Holman, sitting in London, allowed the challenges by the councils, declaring Mr Michael Gove had unlawfully failed to consult them before imposing the cuts. In five of the cases the failure was so unfair as to amount to an abuse of power , said the judge. The victorious authorities include Waltham Forest Council, Luton Borough Council, Nottingham City Council, Sandwell Council, Kent County Council and Newham Council. The judge said: "

The basket gave the 76ers a 99-98 lead, their first since midway through the third quarter. I went to the basket strong and shielded him off with my body, said George Lynch , who is eight inches shorter than Shawn Bradley . New All-Star Michael Finley answered with a jumper at 28.4 seconds and appeared to be the hero again for Dallas when he snagged a rebound of Allen Iverson 's miss.
